properties.areaDesc: Northern Valley; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Phillips; Western Roosevelt; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 11:07AM MST until January 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below
zero.

* WHERE...Locations along and north of the Missouri River.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds chills may rise above 20 below zero
for a few hours at a time through tonight, but will settle back
between 20 to 40 degrees below zero from Saturday morning
through Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IS CANCELLED
